claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

rejected_evidence.quote: because it is not subject to mutations to the A (H3 N2) glycosylation binding site that reduce the effectiveness of egg based vaccines.
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote supports the claim by indicating that Flublok (RIV4) avoids the antigenic changes that can occur in egg-based vaccines, which can lead to a mismatch with the WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains. This implies that Flublok maintains an identical antigenic match to the selected strains.
